Title: Spotify Clone
Description: Spotify Website's clone built on Deezer's API (Playable songs, Albums page, Artist page, Search page & more) and Bootstrap 5. There is also a recent version remade on React.js & Redux, feel free to check out my Github!

Title: Linkedin Clone
Description: Linkedin Website's Clone built on React.js (HTML, CSS, JavaScript), Redux and Bootstrap 5. Posting, viewing every possible profile of 3000 people and having different experiences is possible.

Title: Remote Jobs Search
Description: Remote Job Search built on React.js, Redux & Bootstrap 4. Also, I've added Local Memory with the encrypted key, which makes this application safe&secured. I've focused on functionality and clear code, not the look of the web application.

Title: Portfolio Website
Description: My personal portfolio website built on React.js, Bootstrap 5, CSS and Local Database. Fully responsive from mobile devices to wide computer screens.

Title: Netflix Design
Description: Netflix's clone built on HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Bootstrap 5 and Private Epicode's API.
